verses.verse: Where has your <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H1980>gone,<s%> you <S%H3303>fairest<s%> among <S%H802>women?<s%> Where has your <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H6437>turned,<s%> that we may seek him with <S%H1245>you?<s%> Beloved

My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> has gone <S%H3381>down<s%> to his <S%H1588>garden,<s%> to the <S%H6170>beds<s%> of <S%H1314>spices,<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> in the <S%H1588>gardens,<s%> and to <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H7799>lilies.<s%>
I am my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>'s, and my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is <S%H7462>mine.<s%> He browses among the <S%H7799>lilies,<s%>
You are <S%H3303>beautiful,<s%> my <S%H7474>love,<s%> as <S%H8656>Tirzah,<s%> <S%H5000>lovely<s%> as <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H366>awesome<s%> as an army with <S%H1713>banners.<s%>

Turn <S%H5437>away<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H1992>me,<s%> for they have <S%H7292>overcome<s%> <S%H8181>me.<s%> Your hair is like a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of <S%H5795>goats,<s%> that <S%H1570>lie<s%> along the side of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

Your <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are like a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of <S%H7353>ewes,<s%> which have come <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H7367>washing;<s%> of which every one has <S%H8382>twins;<s%> none is bereaved among <S%H7909>them.<s%>
Your <S%H7541>temples<s%> are like a <S%H6400>piece<s%> of a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> <S%H1157>behind<s%> your <S%H6777>veil.<s%>

My <S%H3123>dove,<s%> my <S%H8535>perfect<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> is unique. She is her <S%H517>mother<s%>'s only <S%H259>daughter.<s%> She is the <S%H1249>favorite<s%> one of her who <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H1323>her.<s%> The daughters <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H833>her,<s%> and called her blessed; the <S%H4436>queens<s%> and the <S%H6370>concubines,<s%> and they praised <S%H1984>her.<s%>

Who is she who looks <S%H8259>forth<s%> as the <S%H7837>morning,<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> as the <S%H3842>moon,<s%> <S%H1249>clear<s%> as the <S%H2535>sun,<s%> and <S%H366>awesome<s%> as an army with <S%H1713>banners?<s%>

I went <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H93>nut<s%> tree <S%H1594>grove,<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the green <S%H3>plants<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> whether the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H5132>budded,<s%> and the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> were in <S%H5132>flower.<s%>
Without <S%H3045>realizing<s%> <S%H5315>it,<s%> my desire <S%H7760>set<s%> me with my royal <S%H5993>people<s%>'s <S%H4818>chariots.<s%> Friends

<S%H7725>Return,<s%> <S%H7725>return,<s%> <S%H7759>Shulammite!<s%> <S%H7725>Return,<s%> <S%H7725>return,<s%> that we may <S%H2372>gaze<s%> at <S%H2372>you.<s%> Lover Why do you desire to gaze at the <S%H7759>Shulammite,<s%> as at the <S%H4246>dance<s%> of <S%H4264>Mahanaim?<s%>
